```{r setup, include = FALSE}
## package and list of various exercises
library("exams2webexercises")
exm <- list(
    c("swisscapital.Rmd", "capitals.Rmd"),
    "deriv.Rnw",
    "deriv2.Rnw",
    "fruit.Rmd",
    "boxplots.Rmd",
    "ttest.Rmd",
    "function.Rmd",
    "lm2.Rnw",
    "fourfold2.Rmd"
)
```

```{r rexams_quiz, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "asis"}
exams2webexercises(exm)
```
